item.title: Analytics dashboard for eCommerce store - Google Looker Studio
item.description: Introduction Utilizing Google Looker Studio for the creation of daily web analytics, alongside a spreadsheet for data visualization and manipulation within the context of an eCommerce store. This setup also facilitates real-time data streaming capabilities. The data source is streaming from Google Analytics. Link Link to the Dashboard Dashboard Figure 1. Dashboard Overview. Figure 2. Flow Analysis . Figure 3. Demographics Analysis . Figure 4. New/Old Client Analysis . Figure 5.

item.title: Data Visualization for eCommerce store - Power BI
item.description: Introduction Using Power BI to develop day-to-day Web Analytics and the Spreadsheet where the visualization and manipulations of data were performed for eCommerce store Link Link to download PBIX File
